entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entry/Editor with SemanticProperties.Description stills hows TalkBack Actions #15888
  • Entry not working when keyboard is numeric and os language is not english (net8-pre5) #15884
    .NET 8
  • System fonts such as ".SFUI-Semibold" are not applied on iOS #15882
    Backlog
  • FlyoutPage: Detail page is not fitting the screen on iOS Tablets when setting the flyout behavior to Split. #15877
  • FlyoutPage: Scrolling is not working in the Detail page on iOS Tablets when setting the flyout behavior to Split. #15876
  • Title blinks when closing the page #15875
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid Webview crash the Application Android #15874
  • [MAUI][Regression] The recipe details page is not fully displayed #15872
  • [iOS, MAC] Image not loading from stream or URI binding source #15871
  • [Android] Grid with columns is not measured correctly. #15870
    Backlog

Closed

  • WinUI: Pushing the same page instance onto a NavigationPage after popping it causes a crash. #7698
    .NET 8
  • Frame does not support BorderWidth #15851
  • WebAuthenticator does not extract parameters contained in a fragment (regression) #15661
  • Remove usages of `BackQueue` from `StackNavigationManager` #5613
    Backlog
  • Border Left and Right Margins Dont work on iOS, works well on Android #13965
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Label in Scrollview doesn't show on iOS #7933
  • Xaml compiler removes xaml-only Resources from Release builds #12659
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Black screen on launch #14408
  • Cannot debug on iOS as `Loaded Assembly xxxxx` phase takes too long. #14822
  • Shell crashes upon adding/removing items #9938
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Wait for switched item to load #15891
  • [net8.0] Update aspnet packages #15887
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Revert] Correctly identify headers/footers when using UngroupedItems… #15886
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix WinUI test issues #15885
    area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression
  • [X] Connect event to internal handler #15881
    area/Xaml </>
  • [X] avoid AmibuousMatchException #15873
    area/Xaml </>
  • Added size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.6.2 to 17.6.3 #15878
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • Daily code formatting task: use different branch for net7.0 branch #15879
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [essentials] ensure WebUtils.ParseQueryString captures fragment parameters #15662
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15865
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Add GotoAsync overload for single use query parameters #15585
    area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue setting ContentPage gradient background #15832
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Backport WinUI DeviceTest Fixes #15840
    area/testing
  • Add logic to set DefaultLabelPosition on the WinUI CommandBar #15835
    platform/windows 🪟, area/toolbar
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Loading images needs the screen scale #14807
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Various fixes for Border on Android #15458
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Move some controls to use ModifyMapping #15058
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
    area/layout 🔲
  • Android ecosytem updates #15399
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [android] improve performance of `Entry.MaxLength` #15614
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Bump GtkSharp from 3.24.24.34 to 3.24.24.95 #15818
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression
